Text: Oñ Jihoram, o̩ma Ehab, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ki Jiho̩shafat jʼonu Juda. I la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji.
I ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, i muda che dab ata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ n; todu i mʼojibo Beal kʼata-wñ che le̩ du tinyo̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i gwo̩nyʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat le̩, owñ chʼe-ki ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure: i kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n.
Oñ Me̩sha, onu Moab, chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼamala; i la kʼamo̩mala icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu me̩lu, kpʼamokolo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu me̩lu manyʼedudu-ma rʼare̩ ñw onu Israe̩l.
Ama i lewatu e̩gba kʼEhab leku, onu Moab le̩ fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro ñw onu Israe̩l.
Tak onu Jihoram kwo Samaria dufu iko le̩, oñ i kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wajo̩.

Tak i le nakpʼuche̩ ru Jiho̩shafat onu Juda kakini, Onu Moab ko̩ mi me̩; e̩ je̩ kʼe̩ lebʼumi akʼogu bo̩ Moab? Oñ i kakini, Nale; omi dʼalu kʼuwe̩ de̩, abo-mi la dab abo-we̩, amanya-mi ño̩ dab amanya-we̩ ge̩.
Tak i kakini, O̩na e-ugbo oñ a ale nyʼo̩mo̩? Tak i dohi kakini, O̩na aje̩tachi Ido̩m.
Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l le̩ kpai onu Juda kpai onu Ido̩m. Oñ ma dagbala dagbala le ule̩ o̩jo̩ mebie; omiofo la do̩mo̩ todu abogu kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki tʼuma ubi n.
Tak onu Israe̩l kakini, Atogwo! Todu Jihofa fʼamonu me̩ta-i ko wa jʼugbo okate kʼi mʼuma ko jʼo̩wo̩ Moab.
Ama Jiho̩shafat kakini, Akache̩ Jihofaʼkate dʼemi, kʼa tu Jihofa ene lʼugbo-wñ n? Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩ onu Israe̩l oka dohi kakini, E̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat, dʼemi, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼomiofo nyʼE̩laija o̩wo̩.
Taku Jiho̩shafat kakini, O̩la Jihofa dʼugbo-wñ. Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat kpai onu Ido̩m gwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ.

Tak E̩laisha ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼuwe̩? Nyʼugbo amakache̩ ata-we̩ kpai ugbo amakache̩ iye-we̩ ke. Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñw u kakini, O̩da, todu Jihofa fʼamonu me̩ta-i kowa jo̩ kʼi ko ma jʼo̩wo̩ Moab.
Tak E̩laisha kakini, Oji Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, e-kʼomi dago o̩gba-wñ-i, ochochi, i ma chʼeju Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, ki wʼumi eju n, u ma rʼeju-mi da ago ugbo kʼe̩ de̩ n, u ma le li uwe̩ n.
Ama fa-i, me̩ ki la dʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼumolo wa ñwu mi. Oñ i lewatu abu kʼene̩ le anʼumolo, o̩wo̩ Jihofa lewa abʼowñ ma.
Oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ che kʼo̩go̩-i ki chʼe̩ko̩ ñw uta, uta.
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ ñʼali afu n, me̩ lañʼali omi ojale n; o̩go̩-i muda ako̩ ñw omi, oñ ame̩ añmo̩ tʼame̩ tʼame̩wñ ukpa-me̩ tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-me̩.
E̩wñ kʼa ka-i la chʼe̩wñ fuye̩e̩ eju Jihofa ta; i año̩ ko abo Moab le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ ge̩.
Tak ame̩ ki gwo ewo du ki nʼaku kpai ewo o̩me̩me̩le̩ du da, me̩ ki la lʼoli o̩me̩me̩le̩ du wane̩, me̩ ki kʼe̩bi e̩bi omi du re, me̩ ki lañʼakʼokuta nyʼe̩bu e̩bu ane̩ ki nyo̩ du ku me̩ kpʼo̩ bie̩.
Oñ i lewatu odudu-wñ, dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele wa odudu le̩, e̩ la go, omi nacha kwʼo̩na Ido̩m le̩ awa, oñ ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka chʼomiofo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Moab chaka gbo̩ ka kʼamonu le̩ wa akʼogu bʼuma, ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ bʼe̩wñ ogu eko nyʼo̩la jo̩, gbogbo tʼabogijo, oñ ma kwodago jo̩ alo̩me̩ ane̩ma.
Tak u ma takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ olu nafu bʼomi le̩ ma. Tak abo Moab fʼomi ki me̩ru ma li kʼi la kpa dab e̩bie̩.
Oñ ma kakini, E̩bie̩ de̩; amonu le̩ kobʼo̩lama me̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la fʼekeji-wñ kpa de̩. Fa-i abo Moab, a alo kʼa jʼakpa ke!
Ama e̩gba ku ma lewa uru abo Israe̩l, abo Israe̩l kwane̩ agwo abo Moab da, oñ ma ra rʼuma o̩gba; taku ma nyʼo̩gba alo toj ane̩ le̩ agwo abo Moab da jane̩.

Ma la guʼewo ewo-ma lo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma dʼokuta-wñ rikpolo tʼe̩bu e̩bu ane̩ ki nyo̩ okoke, oñ ma konyʼu e̩ko̩-wñ. Ma la fʼe̩bi omiofo chaka kare, oñ ma fʼoli-wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ du lo̩, gbogbo tak okuta ku ma to̩no̩ kibo̩ chʼefu Kir-hare̩se̩t kate; ama abo inata donyʼewo le̩ daka, oñ ma fʼu gwoda.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu Moab li ka kʼogu kpuna tʼowñ le, i mʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma nʼo̩be̩chageli ko le bʼowñ, kʼi chʼe̩do̩ kpulu gu ef uma du anyʼugbo onu Ido̩m; ma muda neke che n.
Tak i mʼo̩ma-wñ ogijo kʼi dʼukpe̩ kʼi jʼo̩fe̩ koji-wñ du, oñ i mʼu du chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oj o̩do̩ o̩mo̩. Oñ uwe̩do̩ inaina mutajo bʼabo Israe̩l oji ma; taku ma kwo bʼo̩ te̩, oñ ma mudabi tʼane̩-ma.
